fields.description: APSHTTPClient should not wrap NSURLRequest. Apple's docs, videos and examples consistently demonstrate and recommend that a url request should be immutable, and that readonly properties should be added to NSURLRequest via custom categories.
fields.summary: iOS: APSHTTPClient should not wrap NSURLRequest
